trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Serve como a classe base para designers que fornecem suporte de tempo de design no Designer do Visual Web para controles que derivam de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref> classe abstrata.

trans-unit.source: In the Visual Web Designer, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: No Designer do Visual Web, quando o usuário alterna da origem para o modo de Design, o código de origem de marcação que descreve um controle derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>classe é analisada e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDesigner class serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: A classe ListControlDesigner serve como a classe base para os designers que fornecem suporte de tempo de design no Designer do Visual Web para controles que são derivados de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDesigner class properties provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da classe ListControlDesigner fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade retorna um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto, que normalmente contém um objeto que é derivado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objeto para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>propriedades fornecem acesso às propriedades de um controle que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> de correspondente</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> indicate the fields of the data source that provide the text and value content of the list items, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>indicam os campos da fonte de dados que fornecem o texto e o valor de conteúdo dos itens da lista, respectivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> to a design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos da classe ListControlDesigner fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>método vincula o controle associado que deriva o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>para uma fonte de dados de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método retorna a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>método retorna o tempo de design <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>componente do contêiner de controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> from the control container, resolved to the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>método retorna o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>do contêiner de controle, resolvido para o tempo de design <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A>propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view and design the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>método prepara o designer para exibir e criar o controle associado, que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>método é chamado quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>para o controle associado mudou.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove additional properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>método é usado para remover propriedades adicionais de, adicionar propriedades adicionais, ou propriedades de sombra do controle associado que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>classe quando ele cria o controle associado que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>classe na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de lista de ação de designer para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Binds the specified control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Associa o controle especificado para a fonte de dados de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> base class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> object to reference the design-time data source, then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, and then restores the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties to their original values.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner>classe base a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>método define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>objeto a referência de fonte de dados de tempo de design, em seguida, chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método e, em seguida, restaurações a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>Propriedades para seus valores originais.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class, however, the DataBind method has no functionality, because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> objects were just added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>da classe, no entanto, o método DataBind não tem nenhuma funcionalidade, porque <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>objetos foram adicionados apenas para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The associated control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref>, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O controle associado é derivado de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref>, ou uma cópia desse controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data text field of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o campo de texto de dados do controle.

trans-unit.source: The DataTextField property sets or retrieves the markup to use for the design-time representation of the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataTextField define ou recupera a marcação a ser usado para a representação de tempo de design do controle em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: This provides access via the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> property of the associated control, which corresponds to the field of the data source that provides the text content of the list items.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso por meio do designer para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>propriedade do controle associado, que corresponde ao campo da fonte de dados que fornece o conteúdo de texto dos itens da lista.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField*> of the list control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField*>do controle de lista.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data value field of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o campo de valor de dados do controle.

trans-unit.source: The DataValueField property provides access via the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> property of the associated control, which indicates the field of the data source that provides the value content of the list items.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataValueField fornece acesso por meio do designer para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>propriedade do controle associado, que indica o campo da fonte de dados que fornece o conteúdo de valor dos itens da lista.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField*> of the list control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField*>do controle de lista.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o HTML que é usado para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object is data-bound, the GetDesignTimeHtml method clears the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection and adds a <xref:System.String> message indicating the control is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle associado é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>objeto está associado a dados, o método GetDesignTimeHtml limpa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>coleção e adiciona um <xref:System.String>mensagem indicando que o controle está associado a dados.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: If the associated control is not data-bound and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection is empty, the GetDesignTimeHtml adds a <xref:System.String> message indicating the control is unbound.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle associado não associado a dados e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>coleção estiver vazia, o GetDesignTimeHtml adiciona um <xref:System.String>mensagem indicando que o controle é desassociado.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, the GetDesignTimeHtml calls its base method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, o GetDesignTimeHtml chama o método base para gerar a marcação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the markup used to render the control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>contendo a marcação usada para renderizar o controle derivado de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref> em tempo de design.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o componente de fonte de dados do contêiner de controle associado, resolvido para um membro de dados específico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns `null` if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property is not found, or if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> with the same name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>método retorna `null` se um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>propriedade não for encontrada, ou se um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>com o mesmo nome não existe.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> cannot be resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control, the GetResolvedSelectedDataSource returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>não puder ser resolvido para a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A>propriedade do controle associado, o GetResolvedSelectedDataSource retorna de uma <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interface que contém o tempo de design <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource*>, resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember*> of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>que contém o tempo de design <> </> *>, resolvido para o <> </> *> do controle associado.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o componente de fonte de dados do contêiner de controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The GetSelectedDataSource method returns `null` if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property is not found, or if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> with the same name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: O método GetSelectedDataSource retorna `null` se um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>propriedade não for encontrada, ou se um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>com o mesmo nome não existe.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface and containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource*> of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interface e que contém o tempo de design <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource*>do controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: O host de designer chama o método Initialize quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar o controle que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> de

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O método Initialize e seus métodos base configurem propriedades e conecte-se para eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, that is associated with this designer or is a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o controle derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, que está associada este designer ou é uma cópia desse controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref> that implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um controle é derivado de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref> que implementa um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a fonte de dados para o controle associado é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>método base conecta-se o controle associado que deriva o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>objeto à fonte de dados atual e, se for diferente da fonte de dados ao qual o controle foi conectado, atualiza a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged method updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDataSourceChanged atualiza a marcação de tempo de design depois de se conectar à fonte de dados atual.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a fonte de dados para o controle associado é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>método base conecta-se o controle associado que deriva o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>classe à fonte de dados atual e, se for diferente da fonte de dados ao qual o controle foi conectado, atualiza a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method of the designer unconditionally updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>método do designer atualiza incondicionalmente a marcação de tempo de design depois de se conectar à fonte de dados atual.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of `forceUpdateView` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `forceUpdateView` será ignorado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the design-time markup is to be unconditionally updated.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Boolean>que indica se a marcação de tempo de design será atualizado incondicionalmente.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro é ignorado.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove additional properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Usado pelo designer para remover propriedades adicionais da ou adicionar propriedades para a exibição no **propriedades** grade ou a propriedades de sombra do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle usam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método sombra várias propriedades de controle com as propriedades de tempo de design correspondentes que implementa o designer, e para adicionar ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object, the PreFilterProperties adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter> attribute to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Para controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>do objeto, o PreFilterProperties adiciona o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter>de atributo para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>Propriedades do controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the added or shadowed properties to expose for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Implementando uma coleção de <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>das propriedades adicionadas ou sombreadas expor para o controle associado em tempo de design.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated control should render its default action lists.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle associado deve processar suas listas de ação padrão.

trans-unit.source: The UseDataSourcePickerActionList property returns `false` so that a data source dropdown is not displayed with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade retorna UseDataSourcePickerActionList `false` para que uma fonte de dados lista suspensa não é exibida com o **Escolher fonte de dados** item de menu no **tarefas comuns** menu de contexto.

trans-unit.source: Instead, this menu item displays the **Choose Data Source** dialog box, which allows the user to select a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, este item de menu exibe o **Escolher fonte de dados** caixa de diálogo que permite que o usuário selecione um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
